trapomino

Class StoryGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • trapomino.StoryGame

  • public class StoryGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the Story game mode in Trapomino.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StoryGame

        public StoryGame()
        This constructor starts a new game of the StoryGame mode.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        This method manages the movement in the grid as long as the game is not paused. This method moves the current Tetromino down, left, and right, rotates the current Tetromino, checks if the user is pressing the button to speed its falling, and calls the move method of all the Animals in the grid. It also checks to see if the pause button is clicked, if so it will render and manage the pause menu. This method also sets the music, renders the lose menu.

      • storySpawn

        public void storySpawn()
        This method determines the current level and spawns animals based on story array in Trapomino class.

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method is called by Trapomino, it renders the background, grid, UI, and pause button. When the game is paused, the method will render the pause menu or the lose screen if the player lost.
        Parameters:
        g - - the Graphics where the items in this method will be rendered

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        This method starts a new game by setting all of the variables to their default values and generating the new Grid.
